extension.description:
Template A/B Test

Important: set the order of this plugin to the bottom of your system plugin list.
This plugin randomly selects one of the two template styles set in the options tab. After that the visitor sees the same chosen template style during the session.

Warning! assigned template styles are ignored. Once this plugin has chosen a template style, this is applied to all menu items!
